chart_description: This chart displays the real memory usage (without shared memory) of user groups on the system.

dimension_descriptions.1000: The real memory usage of the group with GID 1000.
dimension_descriptions.32: The real memory usage of the group with GID 32.
dimension_descriptions.65532: The real memory usage of the group with GID 65532.

dimension_descriptions.997: The real memory usage of the group with GID 997.
